title: SAP Could Rally From Here So Go Long on Early Intraday Dip
text:
SAP Could Rally From Here So Go Long on Early Intraday Dip More

In addition to the release of preliminary Q3 results that showed new cloud bookings rising 38%, it was announced that Bill McDermott is stepping down as CEO and that board members Jennifer Morgan and Christian Klein are now co-CEOs. In this daily bar chart of SAP, below, we can see the price action through Thursday and imagine the price strength today. A higher close and heavy trading volume today will probably turn the On-Balance-Volume (OBV) line higher.
